Package com.roscopeco.ormdroid

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Query.SQLExpression  
    TypeMapping
    A mapping between Java types and SQL data.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DateTypeMapping  
    Entity
    Base class for persistent entities.
    EntityTypeMapping
    Standard mapping for Entity subclasses.
    NumericTypeMapping  
    ORMDroidApplication
    Provides static-initialization for the ORMDroid framework.
    Query<T extends Entity>
    Represents and assists with building a database query that will load an object (or graph).
    StringTypeMapping
    Simple TypeMapping that encodes it's values via the Object.toString() method.
    TypeMapper
    Supports mappings between Java types and their SQL representations.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ORMDroidException  
    TypeMappingException  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Column
    Annotation that can be applied to entity classes to set various options.
    Table
    Annotation that can be applied to entity classes in order to configure the table name they are mapped to.
